https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y4Gh8LIJHGyObYbLtXn1ZyyqbQz.jpg In order to buy a horse, a man wanders in the bazaars of Thessaly. His journey will take him further than he imagines, as old prophets, forgotten witches and vampire princes will find himself on his way. Balamos
